title: Client opens fine, but once the actual match should get to the loading screen, whole thing Closes
body: Yeah, the problem is that the client works fine and everything but, whenever i try a match custom or otherwise once it normally goes to the loading screen where it shows everything linking up to the match right before it starts, it doesn't even get there the whole League thing just closes. and I have no idea what to do about it. Any help would greatly be appreciated.

replies.body: Also says the pvp patcher kernel stopped working if that matters

Does this happen if you launch League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (r-click, *run as administrator*) from inside your installation folder (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)? Let me know if that caused any change.

Same thing is happening to me, game opens, loads slowly, then I enter the game and says I disconnected, rinse and repeat.

I'm sticking to the legacy cause this was a ranked game and I don't wanna lost lp :L
